homepage.title: Can not find <callLogs>Call Logs</callLogs> ? View Them Here
homepage.description: Gain comprehensive insights into your communication patterns with detailed call logs and statistics. Effortlessly monitor call durations, track missed calls, and analyze overall communication activity to optimize efficiency and stay connected.

json-guide.step1: In your Facebook page, click the top-right icon to open the dropdown menu.
json-guide.step4: Facebook will take you to another page.
json-guide.step9: Choose where you want to save the file.
json-guide.step10: Important: Choose **Format: JSON** and **Media quality: Low**.
json-guide.step11: Wait for the download. Once extracted, your files will look like this.

mobile-modal.title: Best Viewed on Desktop
mobile-modal.line1: For an optimal experience, we recommend using a PC or laptop.
mobile-modal.line2: Or enable “Desktop site“ on your mobile browser settings.

description.line1: Upload or drag and drop a JSON file here.
description.line3: You can upload more than 10 files at the same time.

description.line1: If you don’t know how to find a JSON file, visit this page for guidance.
Provides an overview of call data, including successful calls, missed calls, and total call duration.
description.line2: Helps track call performance by displaying key metrics like completed and missed calls, along with their durations.

description.line1: A bar chart that visualizes and compares call activities between two individuals.
description.line2: Displays total call hours, successful calls, and missed calls.

description.line1: Displays call and video logs between two individuals.
description.line2: You can filter by date and sort by sender or call duration for better data retrieval.

description.line1: Clears all filters and sorting options at once.
description.line2: You can show or hide the background color of the missed call.

description.line1: Provides quick access to Call Statistics and the Call Logs Table without scrolling.

description.line2: Currently, the app supports the 10+ most commonly used languages.
